thread.title: Lighting win NHL's first 3-on-3 OT thanks to Garrison

title: Lighting win NHL's first 3-on-3 OT thanks to Garrison
text: Lighting win NHL's first 3-on-3 OT thanks to Garrison OCT 09, 1:00 am Watch Valtteri Filppula's insane setup to get Jason Garrison out front for a breakaway goal against the Flyers in the NHL's first 3-on-3 overtime format. Five outrageous predictions for NFL Week 5 0 Comments You may use your Facebook account to add a comment on FoxSports.com , subject to Facebook's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy .
